name: VR StarCombat Next
description:
In VR StarCombat Next, stage selection newly appeared.
We will update the stage from time to time.
By corresponding to the VR controller, it became possible to enjoy a higher immersive feeling.
- Stage selection
- Change of viewpoint
- VR mode / VR controller mode / Tilt (terminal tilt) mode / touch mode
- Guide function to enemy area
- Various mother ships
- Many enemy aircraft
- Fall meteorite
- Reality excitement
- Explosion effect
- Flight simulator
- Detection of skew of smartphone
- Lock on function

Leaderboard
- Compete the number of shots to kill with users all over the world!
Achievement
- Canceled achievement items due to specific conditions!

Automatic machine gun control in VR mode * (Lasers are launched at regular intervals)
VR Gamepad Mode, Move Pad Operating Machine and Launch Laser on
Tilt mode laser shooting with touch to the right half of the screen.
In Touch mode, you touch the left side of the screen and control the aircraft.
